nodes.text: Gerault was a male commander in the Imperial Guard during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Serving under General Hesker during the Battle of Ilum, Gerault was stationed at the Imperial base camp on the planet Ilum.
Commander Gerault appears as the Imperial faction's Flashpoint Courier for the Flashpoint "The False Emperor" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
